long_description: A zippy bike for commuting, errands and cruising about town, the versatile Raleigh Cadent I8 Bike features an internally geared, low-maintenance 8-speed hub for very smooth shifting. Shimano Nexus internally geared rear hub provides 8 smooth-shifting speeds and is relatively maintenance free compared to conventional cassette systems. Hydroformed and butted aluminum frame provides a comfortable, sporty ride with excellent handling and pedaling efficiency; upright position enhances visibility and comfort. Twist shifter ratchets through gear changes with an easy flick of the wrist. Fast-rolling 700c wheels feature tough double-walled rims and puncture-resistant Schwalbe Road Cruiser tires for easy rolling. Internal cable routing helps protect cables and allows clean lines. Eyelets accommodate a rear rack and fenders (not included). Specs on the Raleigh Cadent i8 Bike are subject to change.
short_description: A zippy bike for commuting, errands and cruising about town, the versatile Raleigh Cadent I8 Bike features an internally geared, low-maintenance 8-speed hub for very smooth shifting.
